doc.field: Series I: Labor unions and organizations
Series I: Labor unions and organizations
Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives Collection of Labor Movement Serials
Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives Collection of Labor Movement Serials
Subseries I.K: Retail and Service Workers
Subseries I.K: Retail and Service Workers

The serials in this series document the activities of unions of clothing workers, retail staff, hospital housestaff, and hotel and food service employees. Among the publishing organizations represented are large, national unions including the Amalgamated Clothing and Textile Workers Union and International Ladies' Garment Workers' Union. The series contains newspapers and newsletters documenting textile work in and around New York throughout the 20th Century, including serials aimed at younger readers -- the International Ladies' Garment Workers' Union's Student Magazine -- and three variants of the International Ladies' Garment Workers' Union's newspaper Justice: the Italian-language Giustizia, the Yiddish-language Gerechtigkeit, and the Spanish-language Justicia).
